home.mainBlurb1: We create open-source solutions for those itches in life that need scratching.
home.mainBlurb2: Enrich your life without breaking the bank.
home.OSSonOSSBlurb: We believe in the power of open source. All of our projects are free to self-host, modify and contribute to. Any third-party services we use are also open source.
home.partOfPage: the very page you're reading is open source! Here's part of it compared with the previous version:
home.SimpleNCheap: Designed with simplicity for ultimate cost-effectiveness
home.SimpleNCheapBlurb: We don't believe in overcomplicating things. Our projects are designed to be simple to use, and aren't held up by expensive third-party services. The savings are passed on to you!
home.SelfFundedBlurb: We don't have any investors or VC to answer to, so we can decide when we make a profit. We're here to make cool stuff, not money.
home.WorkWithBestBlurb: We partner with other cool organizations and help get their cool stuff out there. We're all about the community :3
home.NoWaitBlurb: Check out our projects and see if there's something you like!

nav.cookieConsent: We use cookies for analytics and making stuff work. By clicking 'mmmmmmm cookies üç™', you agree to our use of cookies.
